data_table.description: Sample ID, superfamily, subject type, body site where sample was collected, tumor status, histological type of sample, and genotyping center of participants with or without Barrett's and esophageal adenocarcinoma and involved in the "Barrett's and Esophageal Adenocarcinoma Genetic Susceptibility Study (BEAGESS)" project.

variable.name: SUPERFAMILY
variable.description: Family identifier for families that include half-sib-like relationships

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: GENOTYPING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted genotyping
